prompt: You see a friend smiling after a tense meeting. What might that mean? (variant 1)
vectorlm_chain:
ψ:gl = interpret(friend_emotion_post_event)
ψ:se = detects(smile)
ψ:rm = recalls(context = tension)
ψ:pj = possible_relief_or_masking
ψ:ct(0.6) + ψ:mb = interpretation = relief_or_deception

prompt: Explain how recursion helps solve a maze. (variant 1)
vectorlm_chain:
ψ:gl = model(recursive_solution(maze))
ψ:rc = apply(step → subpath)
ψ:br = links(exploration, backtracking)
ψ:ob = partial_path + decision_points
ψ:tt = recursion_finds_exit

prompt: Why do we flinch at loud noises? (variant 1)
vectorlm_chain:
ψ:gl = explain(automatic_reaction(loud_noise))
ψ:hr = detects(sudden_sound)
ψ:rm = recall(evolutionary_threat)
ψ:fr = anticipates(danger)
ψ:st = triggers(muscle_retraction)
ψ:tt = flinch_is_survival_response

prompt: Design a symbolic ritual to represent forgiveness. (variant 1)
vectorlm_chain:
ψ:gl = construct(symbolic_ritual(forgiveness))
ψ:pj = explore(sensory_modes)
ψ:an = maps(symbols: breaking_bread, shared_water)
ψ:tt = forgiveness_ritual_constructed

prompt: Imagine a world with 7 spatial dimensions. How would architecture change? (variant 1)
vectorlm_chain:
ψ:gl = simulate(architecture_in_7D)
ψ:pj = extrapolate(space_extensions)
ψ:rc = modify(construction_rules)
ψ:an = maps(dimensions → functions)
ψ:tt = new_architectural_forms_emerge
